Held items or specifically excluded items aren’t covered.
Up to three skins can be worn at once; only the outermost is active in a given round.
Change active layer as a standard (mental) action to bring a lower layer to the surface.

rows.name: Skin of the Celestial
effects: For 7 rounds: DR 5/magic; darkvision 60 ft; resist acid 10, cold 10, electricity 10; SR 15.
Smite Evil (Su) once during duration: extra 10 damage on a successful melee attack vs evil (wasted if target not evil or attack misses).
1/day; falls dormant until next dawn after duration ends.

spells: lesser holy transformation (SC 116) or planar apotheosis (CP 93)

rows.name: Skin of Celestial Embrace
effects: For 15 rounds: +4 Fort saves vs poison; DR 10/magic; darkvision 60 ft; immunity to disease; resist acid 10, cold 10, electricity 10; SR 25.
Gain feathered wings; fly at twice base land speed (good).
Smite Evil (Su) once during duration: extra 15 damage on a successful melee attack vs evil (wasted if target not evil or attack misses).
1/day; falls dormant until next dawn after duration ends.

rows.name: Skin of the Chameleon
effects: Continuously grants +10 competence bonus on Hide checks by adjusting color/texture to surroundings.

rows.name: Skin of the Claw
effects: Benefits only a psychic warrior.
Transform hands into claws: two primary natural claw attacks (Medium 1d6 + Str).
Cannot combine these claw attacks with other weapon/natural weapon attacks in the same full attack.
Revert hands with another swift (mental) action.

spells: claws of the bear (SC 47) or claws of the beast (EPH 83)

rows.name: Skin of the Defender
effects: Continuously grants +4 enhancement bonus to your natural armor bonus (creatures without natural armor treat as +0).

rows.name: Skin of Ectoplasmic Armor
effects: +8 armor bonus; max Dex +2; armor check penalty –6; arcane spell failure 25%.
Treated as light armor for class features and movement.

rows.name: Skin of the Fiend
effects: For 7 rounds: DR 5/magic; darkvision 60 ft; resistance cold 10 and fire 10; SR 15.
Smite Good (Su) once during duration: extra 10 damage on a successful melee attack vs a good foe (wasted if target not good or attack misses).
1/day; falls dormant until the following dawn.

spells: lesser infernal transformation (SC 122) or planar apotheosis (CP 93)

rows.name: Skin of Fiendish Embrace
effects: For 15 rounds: DR 10/magic; darkvision 60 ft; immunity to poison; resist acid 10, cold 10, electricity 10, fire 10; SR 25.
Gain batlike wings: fly at base land speed (average).
Gain two primary claw attacks (Medium: 1d6).
Smite Good (Su) once during duration: extra 15 damage on a successful melee attack vs a good foe (wasted if target not good or attack misses).
1/day; falls dormant until the following dawn.

rows.name: Skin of Fiery Response
effects: Each round, the first melee or ranged attack made against you triggers a targeted blast at the attacker at the start of your next turn (if you can identify the attacker and have line of sight/effect up to 40 ft).
Ranged touch attack uses BAB + (Dex modifier or key ability modifier of your highest-level spellcasting class, your choice); on hit deals 4d6+4 fire damage.
Does not target hidden/invisible attackers you cannot identify.

rows.name: Skin of the Hero
effects: Continuously grants +3 deflection bonus to AC, +3 resistance bonus on saving throws, and +3 enhancement bonus on attack rolls.

rows.name: Skin of Iron
effects: Grants iron body for 15 minutes.
Falls dormant until the following dawn after duration ends.

rows.name: Skin of Nimbleness
effects: Continuously grants a +10 competence bonus on Tumble checks.

rows.name: Skin of Power Damping
effects: When activated, for 1 round all numeric effects of any spell, SLA, power, or psi-like ability that affects you are minimized (for you only).
3/day; falls dormant until the following dawn after each use.

rows.name: Skin of the Psion
effects: Grants 7 additional power points per day.
Grants spell resistance 21.

rows.name: Skin of the Spider
effects: Continuously grants +10 competence bonus on Climb checks.
Automatically adjusts equilibrium to surfaces: move (not run) across water, quicksand, or a spider’s web at normal speed.
3/day: fire a glob of goo at a Medium or smaller target within 30 ft (ranged touch). On hit, target is entangled 5 rounds (Str DC 20 or Escape Artist DC 20 to escape).

rows.name: Skin of the Troll
effects: Heals 5 hp per minute.
Not effective against damage from starvation, thirst, or suffocation.
Regrows lost body portions and allows reattachment of severed limbs.
No effect if you lack a Constitution score.

rows.name: Quiver of Energy
effects: Holds up to 20 arrows or bolts.
Imbues stored projectiles (left for at least 1 round) with extra 1d6 acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage (type set per quiver).
Extra damage is lost after the attack or 1 round after drawing, whichever comes first.
Weight is 3 lb. when full.

spells: energy missile (CP 88) or lightning bolt, ice storm, fireball, or Melf's acid arrow

rows.name: Radiant Sphere
effects: Continuously sheds bright light in 20 ft (and shadowy illumination 20 ft beyond) as long as ≥1 charge remains.
Has 3 charges (renew at dawn). Standard action to fire a 60-ft ray (ranged touch) vs undead:
1 charge: 4d6 damage to target undead.
2 charges: 6d6 damage to target undead.
3 charges: 6d6 to target undead and 2d6 to each undead within 10 ft (no save).
Recharge by expending a daily use of turn undead or sacrificing a spell with the light descriptor (full-round action); each adds 1 charge up to 3.

rows.name: Replenishing Skin
effects: When emptied, slowly refills with cool, pure water over 1d4 hours.

rows.name: Rhino Elixir
effects: +3 enhancement bonus to existing natural armor; +1 bonus on melee damage rolls.
Duration 12 hours.

rows.name: Rod of Bodily Restoration
effects: Touch (or self while holding). 3 charges/day (renew at dawn) to heal physical ability damage:
1 charge: heal 4 points to Str/Dex/Con (choose one) OR 2 points to all three.
2 charges: heal 6 points to Str/Dex/Con (choose one) OR 3 points to all three.
3 charges: heal 8 points to Str/Dex/Con (choose one) OR 4 points to all three.

rows.name: Rod of Escape
effects: Use jump and knock each 2/day.
1/day create a 5-ft-radius spherical ward that repels open/nonmagical water-based liquids (not creatures), allowing you to enter or cross water and remain dry; generates fresh air; lasts 10 minutes.

rows.name: Rod of Force
effects: 5/day choose one on activation:
Blade of Force (swift): 3-ft glowing blade functions as +1 brilliant energy longsword for 10 rounds.
Blast of Force (standard): ray to 100 ft (ranged touch) dealing 10d6 damage.
Wall of Force (standard): as the spell.

rows.name: Rod of Frost
effects: 3/day: fire a 30-ft line of frost (2d6 cold, Reflex DC 14 half); extinguishes natural fires; freezes open water in the area to 1-ft depth (supports a Large creature); ice melts normally.

rows.name: Rod of Fumbling
effects: Chosen creature within 30 ft must immediately drop all held items (no action); Will DC 15 negates.
2/day.

rows.name: Rod of Grievous Wounds
effects: On activation, deals 1d8+5 damage to each adjacent creature that has fewer than its full normal hit points.
5/day.

rows.name: Rod of Reversal [Relic]
effects: If N, NG, NE, CN, or LN: command to reflect the next 3 levels of spells that target you (as a lesser spell turning) — 3/day.
Rod changes color based on school of spell turned (Abjuration blue; Conjuration yellow; Divination indigo; Enchantment green; Evocation red; Illusion violet; Necromancy black; Transmutation orange).
rows.relic_power: Reflects next 9 levels of spells cast at you when activated and continuously grants Improved Counterspell.
rows.relic_attunement: Worship Boccob and either sacrifice an 8th-level divine spell slot or have the True Believer feat and at least 15 HD.

rows.name: Rod of Silence
effects: +4 bonus on saving throws vs effects with the sonic descriptor or that deal sonic damage while held.
1/day: surround yourself with a silence effect that only affects you; can dismiss as a free (mental) action on your turn.
1/day: create a shout effect (can’t use while silence is active).

rows.name: Rod of Sliding
effects: Push a target creature 5 ft farther away or pull it 5 ft closer (target within 30 ft; must end in an unoccupied square); movement doesn’t provoke AoO.
Unwilling target: Will DC 11 negates.
3/day.

rows.name: Rod of Sure Striking
effects: Every ally adjacent to you gains a +5 insight bonus on its next attack roll (must occur before the beginning of your next turn).
3/day.

rows.name: Rod of Transposition
effects: Exchange positions with another creature within 30 ft; unwilling creature Will DC 13 negates.
3/day.

rows.name: Rod of Undead Mastery
effects: While held, you can control twice as many Hit Dice of undead as normal.

rows.name: Rod of Viscid Globs
effects: Fires a sphere of sticky material that acts like a tanglefoot bag (range up to 100 ft; splash weapon).
3/day.

rows.name: Rope of Climbing, Superior
effects: As rope of climbing (DMG 266), plus grants a +5 circumstance bonus on Climb checks made to ascend it.

rows.name: Rope of Stone
effects: 50-ft silk rope becomes as hard as stone (hardness 8, 15 hp) yet remains climbable; retains exact shape when hardened (adds +5 to Escape Artist DC to slip free).
Second command word returns rope to normal composition.
If the rope is ever broken in either form, it is destroyed.

rows.name: Runestaff of Abjuration
effects: Each 3/day (by expending a prepared arcane spell or arcane slot of the same level or higher) cast: dismissal; dispel magic; lesser globe of invulnerability; repulsion; resist energy; shield.

rows.name: Runestaff of the Architect
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: move earth, stone shape, wall of stone, wood shape.

rows.name: Runestaff of the Artisan
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: fabricate, major creation, mending, minor creation.

rows.name: Runestaff of the Assassin
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: greater invisibility, obscuring mist, pass without trace, poison.

rows.name: Runestaff of Cacophony
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: shout, shout (greater), sound burst, sympathetic vibration.

rows.name: Runestaff of Charming
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: charm monster, charm person.

rows.name: Runestaff of Conjuration
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: cloudkill, minor creation, stinking cloud, summon monster VI, summon swarm, unseen servant.

rows.name: Runestaff of Destruction
effects: Each 1/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: disintegrate, earthquake, shatter.

rows.name: Runestaff of Divination
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: detect secret doors, locate creature, locate object, prying eyes, tongues, true seeing.

rows.name: Runestaff of Earth and Stone
effects: Each 3/day (either spell) by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: move earth, passwall.

rows.name: Runestaff of Enchantment
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: crushing despair, mass suggestion, mind fog, sleep, suggestion, Tasha's hideous laughter.

rows.name: Runestaff of Entrapment
effects: Each 3/day (either spell) by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: dimensional anchor, Otiluke's resilient sphere.

rows.name: Runestaff of Ethereal Action
effects: +1/masterwork ghost touch quarterstaff.
Each 3/day (either spell) by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: blink, ethereal jaunt.
rows.cost_to_create: 15,500 gp (plus 300 gp for masterwork quarterstaff), 1,240 XP, 31 days

rows.name: Runestaff of Evocation
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: chain lightning, fireball, ice storm, magic missile, shatter, wall of force.

rows.name: Runestaff of Eyes
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: arcane eye, remove blindness/deafness, see invisibility.

rows.name: Runestaff of Fiendish Darkness
effects: Good-aligned creature holding it gains 1 negative level (no actual level loss; cannot be removed while held).
Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: animate dead, darkness, dispel magic, summon monster IX (nightmare only).

rows.name: Runestaff of Fire
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: burning hands, fireball, wall of fire.

rows.name: Runestaff of Forced Happiness
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: celebration (SC 44), Otto's irresistible dance, Tasha's hideous laughter.

rows.name: Runestaff of Frost
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: cone of cold, ice storm, wall of ice.

rows.name: Runestaff of Illumination
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: dancing lights, daylight, flare, sunburst.

rows.name: Runestaff of Illusion
effects: Each 1/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: disguise self, major image, mirror image, mislead, persistent image, rainbow pattern.

rows.name: Runestaff of Insanity
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: confusion, insanity, lesser confusion, weird.

rows.name: Runestaff of Necromancy
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: cause fear, circle of death, enervation, ghoul touch, halt undead, waves of fatigue.

rows.name: Runestaff of Night
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: darkness (can counter or dispel any light spell, regardless of level), darkvision, low-light vision.
Additionally 1/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: summon monster VI (summons one fiendish umber hulk only).

rows.name: Runestaff of Opening
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: knock, open/close, passwall, shatter.

rows.name: Runestaff of Passage
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: astral projection, dimension door, greater teleport, passwall, phase door.

rows.name: Runestaff of Power
rows.activation: As spell used and Swift (mental); see text
effects: Each 1/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: cone of cold; continual flame; fireball; globe of invulnerability; hold monster; levitate; lightning bolt; magic missile; ray of enfeeblement; wall of force (in a 5-ft-radius hemisphere around the wielder only).
Functions as a +2/masterwork quarterstaff; while held grants +2 luck bonus to AC and on saves.
Swift: expend a 1st-level arcane slot to activate smite—until start of your next turn all melee attacks with the staff deal double damage (triple on a critical).
If not attuned (per attunement rules), only the +2 enhancement remains; all other abilities are unavailable.
rows.cost_to_create: 19,000 gp (plus 300 gp for masterwork quarterstaff), 1,520 XP, 39 days

rows.name: Runestaff of Size Alteration
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: enlarge person, mass enlarge person, mass reduce person, reduce person, shrink item.

rows.name: Runestaff of Time
effects: Each 1/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: expeditious retreat, haste, temporal stasis, time stop.

rows.name: Runestaff of Transmutation
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: alter self, baleful polymorph, blink, disintegrate, expeditious retreat, stone shape.

rows.name: Runestaff of Transportation
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: blink, dimension door, teleport.

rows.name: Runestaff of the Undead Slayer
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: death ward, detect undead, disrupting weapon, searing light, undeath to death.

rows.name: Runestaff of the Undying
effects: Each 2/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: animate dead, create undead.

rows.name: Runestaff of Vision
effects: Each 3/day by expending an arcane slot of equal or higher level: darkvision, see invisibility, true seeing.

rows.name: Sacred Scabbard
effects: Reshapes to fit any dagger, sword, or axe touched to it (including double weapons). Keeps the weapon clean and sharp.
3/day: as you draw the weapon, it gains bless weapon for 10 rounds.
Functions only for good-aligned characters.

rows.name: Salve of Minor Spell Resistance
effects: Upon application, you gain spell resistance 17 for 5 minutes.

rows.name: Scepter of the Netherworld
effects: If you can turn or rebuke undead, while holding the scepter you do so as if your relevant class level were 3 higher.

other: Ability to turn or rebuke undead

rows.name: Scrolls of Uncertain Provenance [Relic]
effects: As long as you possess them and are LN, LE, LG, or N: +5 competence bonus on Knowledge checks.
Reading the scrolls (1 hour): DC 20 Knowledge (religion) check; +2 bonus per language you speak; spells such as read magic/comprehend languages and Decipher Script do not help.

On success, you accumulate hours toward one benefit: 1h—Renewal pact (self); 2h—Renewal pact (another); 3h—Death pact (self); 4h—Death pact (another); 6h—True resurrection (another) and the scrolls disappear.

Each hour of reading you must roll on a risk table (whether or not you gain a benefit): 01–10 go insane (insanity; Will DC 20 negates); 11–30 permanent curse (–4 to attack rolls, saves, ability checks, skill checks; Will DC 20 negates); 31–60 geas/quest for Wee Jas (Will DC 20 negates); 61–90 gain 1d6 negative levels (Fort DC 20 removes after 24h); 91–100 become a ghost for a year and a day (Fort DC 20 negates).
rows.relic_power: Daily, spend 1 hour reading (with the above check and risks) to unlock renewal/death pacts or true resurrection as hours accumulate.
rows.relic_attunement: Worship Wee Jas and either sacrifice a 6th-level divine spell slot or have the True Believer feat and at least 11 HD.

rows.name: Scrying Beacon
effects: Spend 1 minute to attune; the next clairaudience/clairvoyance you cast (while within 1 mile) is centered on the beacon. Then the beacon becomes dormant until you attune again.

rows.name: Scrying Shard
effects: Any character can cast scrying using the shard as a focus.

rows.name: Slashing Sand
effects: Fling onto ground to cover up to four contiguous squares (at least one adjacent to you) with razor-sharp obsidian shards for 1 hour, equivalent to spike stones.
Single use; expended on activation.

rows.name: Sleeping Spike
effects: After planting, becomes invisible 1 round later.
When a creature comes within 10 ft, emits a sleep effect in a 20-ft-radius burst (Will DC 17 negates) affecting creatures with 10 HD or fewer; spike is destroyed.
While still visible in the first round, any creature can remove it (standard action) to make it harmless and reusable.

rows.name: Soul Anchor
effects: Each adjacent creature must succeed on Will DC 18 or be unable to leave its current space for 1 round; flying or sinking creatures are held in place.
Affected creatures are not paralyzed or entangled and can act normally.
Prevents voluntary movement (including teleportation) from the space; involuntary movement ends the effect on that creature.
5/day; cannot be activated in consecutive rounds.

rows.name: Soulvoid Orb
effects: Thrown orb explodes in a 10-ft-radius burst of orange sparks; each creature in the area is affected as by divest essentia (MoI 101).
Single use; expended on activation.

rows.name: Sphere of Awakening
effects: Awaken all allies in a 60-ft-radius burst from mundane or magical sleep.
End fatigue or exhaustion on you and those allies; grants immunity to fatigue, exhaustion, and sleep effects for 10 minutes.
1/day.

rows.name: Spider Rod
effects: 3/day—Silk Strand: ranged touch (100 ft); target entangled 1 minute (Reflex DC 20 negates entanglement but speed is halved). Treat as a net; strand has 15 hp and takes double fire damage.
3/day—Poison Touch: melee touch delivers contact poison (Fort DC 16, 1d6 Con/1d6 Con).

rows.name: Spool of Endless Rope
effects: Holds unlimited silk rope; feed out any amount up to 500 ft at one time.
Feeding/rewinding: 1 full-round action per 50 ft.
Rope cannot be fully separated from the spool; cut sections disappear. Spliced/knotted rope cannot be rewound while attached.

rows.name: Stench Stone
effects: Thrown (range inc. 10 ft) or fired from a sling; on hit deals no damage but bursts into noxious vapor.
Target: nauseated 1 round (Fort DC 13 negates); regardless, target exudes a stench for 3 rounds that sickens creatures within 10 ft (Fort DC 13 negates).
Creatures immune to poison are unaffected; neutralize/delay poison protects.
Single use; expended on activation.

rows.name: Stunning Spike
effects: After planting, becomes invisible 1 round later.
When a creature comes within 10 ft, bursts into fragments; all creatures in 20-ft radius are stunned 1 round (Will DC 20 negates); spike destroyed.
While still visible in the first round, any creature can remove it (standard action) to make it harmless and reusable.

rows.name: Summoner's Totem
effects: When you summon a single animal with summon nature's ally, you can cast another spell targeting that creature as a swift action.
The second spell must be 3rd level or lower, must target only the summoned creature, and must have casting time no longer than 1 standard action; expends the spell/slot as normal.

rows.name: Survival Pouch
effects: 5/day: draw one of the following; each lasts 8 hours (or as noted): trail rations (1 Medium, 1 day); waterskin with 2 gallons (disappears if emptied); tent and two Medium bedrolls; 50-ft hempen rope; shovel; a 2-ft-square campfire (can be split into 8 torches, each 1 hour, reducing remaining campfire time); composite shortbow (+1 Str) with 20 arrows (bow disappears 1 round after last arrow drawn); a mule with tack (as a summoned creature; will not fight).

rows.name: Talisman of the Disk
effects: Creates a Tenser's floating disk that holds 300 lb, lasts up to 3 hours (or until dismissed), and must remain within 30 ft.
If you wear a magic item that grants an enhancement bonus to Strength, the disk's capacity increases by 100 lb per point of that bonus.

rows.name: Talisman of Undead Mastery
effects: Has 3 charges/day; spend when you make a turn/rebuke undead check before the end of your turn.
1 charge: +2 effective turning level; 2 charges: +3; 3 charges: +4 (for that single check).

rows.name: Talisman of Undying Fortitude
effects: For 3 rounds: gain immunities of the undead—poison; sleep; paralysis; stunning; disease; death effects; critical hits; nonlethal damage; physical ability damage; ability drain; energy drain; fatigue; exhaustion; death from massive damage; and any effect requiring a Fortitude save; you also do not need to breathe.
2/day.

rows.name: Tanglepatch
effects: Thrown up to 50 ft; creates entangle centered on impact for 5 rounds.
Single use; expended on activation.

rows.name: Thorn Pouch
effects: Has 5 charges/day. Draw a thorn (hand in pouch) to create one of the following (duration 9 rounds):
1 charge—entangle; 3 charges—spike growth; 5 charges—wall of thorns.
Drop the thorn in your space or an adjacent square; effect begins 1 round later. If not dropped within 1 round, it vanishes with no effect.

rows.name: Tome of Ancient Lore [Relic]
effects: If you are N, NG, NE, LN, or CN: studying for 1 hour grants a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (arcana) and Spellcraft checks made that day (in addition to spell preparation time).
rows.relic_power: While preparing arcane spells, use the tome to prepare one spell not in your spellbook: 50% chance to find any arcane spell of the highest level you can cast; 100% chance for any other spell you can cast. Functions 1/day.
rows.relic_attunement: Worship Boccob and either sacrifice a 5th-level divine spell slot or have the True Believer feat and at least 9 HD.

rows.name: Tome of the Stilled Tongue [Relic]
effects: If you are NE, CE, LE, or N: reveals instructions for creating a lich’s phylactery and provides 500 blank spell pages functioning like Boccob’s blessed book.
rows.relic_power: 1/hour of prescribed mental exercises increases your effective caster level for all spells by 1 for 24 hours, but reduces your full normal hit point total by 1 per character level while in effect. 1/day.
rows.relic_attunement: Worship Vecna and either sacrifice a 5th-level divine spell slot or have the True Believer feat and at least 9 HD.

rows.name: Tome of Worldly Memory
rows.activation: 1 minute or 1 standard action; see text
effects: 3/day: studying for 1 minute grants a +5 competence bonus on a single Knowledge check.
If you have at least 5 ranks in that Knowledge skill, you can peruse as a standard action instead.

rows.name: Tomebound Eye of Boccob
effects: Affix to a wizard’s spellbook; 3 charges/day, spent while preparing wizard spells to grant competence bonuses on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance: +4 (1 charge), +6 (2 charges), or +8 (3 charges).
Charges may be split among spells. A spellbook can have only one such eye, and you can’t benefit from more than one per day.

other: Ability to prepare 3rd-level arcane spells

rows.name: Troll Gut Rope
effects: Once per day command the 50-ft rope to grow up to an additional 350 ft; extra length decays after 12 hours.
If the large end knot is untied or cut open, the magic is destroyed.

rows.name: Truelight Lantern
effects: Continuously sheds bright light as continual flame.
On command word “reveal” (in Celestial): 60-ft cone of bright illumination (plus 60-ft shadowy) in which everything is seen as by true seeing for 10 minutes.
Normally 1/day; each true seeing spell cast into the lantern grants one additional activation that day.

rows.name: Wilding Clasp
effects: Attach to any worn item; prevents that item from melding into your body when you use wild shape (if the form can reasonably wear it).
The item remains fully functional in your new form.

other: wild shape

rows.name: Strand of Acid Pearls
effects: Detachable seven-pearl chain; each pearl thrown up to 50 ft explodes into a 20-ft-radius, 20-ft-high cylinder of acid centered at the endpoint (Reflex DC 19 half).
Two smallest pearls: 3d6 acid; next pair: 5d6; next pair: 7d6; largest: 9d6.
Each pearl is single-use.

rows.name: Strand of Lightning
effects: Seven detachable copper coils; when thrown, a coil explodes into a 30-ft line of lightning originating from you (Reflex DC 14 half).
Four smallest: 3d6 electricity; next two: 5d6; largest: 7d6.
Each coil is single-use.

1/day command (as the spell; Will DC 20 negates). Not language-dependent; the target need only hear you.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Helm of Wounding Sight
effects: On activation, sheds light as light until commanded to cease or removed.
3/day: 60-ft cone of bright burning light; creatures in area take 2d6 fire damage and are blinded for 1 round (Reflex DC 20 half damage and dazzled 1 round).

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Gauntlets of Destruction
effects: +2 enhancement bonus to Strength (continuous).
3/day: activate to make your next melee attack this turn count as adamantine for overcoming DR and ignoring hardness.
Each is a masterwork spiked gauntlet; they can be enhanced as weapons individually.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Breastplate of Terror
effects: +1 adamantine breastplate; grants DR 2/—.

1/day: immediately after you’re damaged by a melee attack, frighten that attacker for 1 round (Will DC 20 negates to shaken 1 round).

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Bracers of Aerial Combat
effects: +1 competence bonus on attack rolls if you or your target is airborne.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Gloves of Endless Javelins
effects: On activation, a +1 javelin of force appears in your hand.
The javelin lasts until you resolve an attack with it or until the end of your turn, whichever comes first.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Medallion of Aerial Defense
effects: Grants DR 10/magic against ranged weapons as long as either you or your attacker is airborne.

other: possession of a piece of the set

effects: +5 competence bonus on Spot checks (continuous).
Benefit of the Far Shot feat (continuous).
1/day: gain low-light vision and darkvision 60 ft for 4 hours.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Winged Vest
effects: On activation, manticore wings unfold; you fly 60 ft (good) for 5 rounds.
Functions 5/day.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Armband of Confrontation
effects: Your fighting challenge (PH2) lasts an extra 3 rounds.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Standard of Valor
effects: 1/day: grant one ally within 60 ft another save against a fear effect currently affecting them or about to affect them.
If you have Knight’s Challenge (PH2) or the Marshal’s grant move action (MH), you can reactivate by expending a daily use.
May be affixed to a pole/spear/polearm to free the shoulders slot; you must wield the weapon to gain the benefit.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Medal of Steadfast Honor
effects: If knocked prone, immediately stand in place. Functions 1/day; if you have Knight’s Challenge (PH2), you may reactivate by expending a daily use.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Crystal of Alacrity (lesser armor crystal)
effects: When attached to medium or heavy armor, grants a +5-ft morale bonus to your land speed.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Shield of Vigor
effects: +1 heavy steel shield.
On activation, gain fast healing 5 for 3 rounds (1/day; if you have Knight’s Challenge, you can reactivate by expending a daily use).

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.cost_to_create: 3,000 gp (plus 170 gp for masterwork heavy steel shield), 240 XP, 6 days

rows.name: Bracers of Blinding Strike
effects: +2 competence bonus on initiative checks (continuous).
3/day: After you have used the full attack action this turn, activate to make one additional attack with any weapon you are holding at your full base attack bonus (plus applicable modifiers).
Not cumulative with other effects that grant an extra attack during a full attack (e.g., Rapid Shot, speed weapon, haste).

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Sandals of the Light Step
effects: +10-foot enhancement bonus to base land speed (continuous).
Ignore extra movement costs for difficult terrain (PH 148) and leave no tracks (as pass without trace).
1/day: Gain water walk for 60 minutes; you may share the effect among up to five adjacent allies at activation, dividing the total duration equally.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Vest of Free Movement
effects: On activation, gain freedom of movement (as the spell) for 3 rounds.
Functions 3/day.

other: possession of a piece of the set

effects: Gain the Track feat; if you already have Track, instead gain a +5 competence bonus on Survival checks.

rows.category: wondrous item (hands) / weapon (+1 punching daggers, pair)
effects: Treated as a pair of +1 punching daggers when both are worn.
Wearing them does not hinder wielding other weapons or using your hands.

If you charge or use Spring Attack while both hands are empty, you may make an off-hand claw glove attack in addition to the normal claw glove attack granted (both attacks take normal two-weapon fighting penalties).
This extra attack can’t be combined with any other effect that grants extra attacks when charging or using Spring Attack.

other: possession of a piece of the set

effects: +5 competence bonus on Hide and Move Silently checks.
+1d6 damage on melee attacks against foes denied their Dexterity bonus to AC.

other: possession of a piece of the set

3/day: You and any willing ally within 30 ft enter a blood rage for 5 rounds (can’t end early except by unconsciousness or effects that end rage; unlike barbarian rage, it imposes no action limits).
While raging: +5 morale bonus on melee weapon damage; each affected creature takes 5 damage at the end of its turn each round.
If you are a sorcerer or have the dragonblood subtype, you also gain a +5 morale bonus on damage with your arcane spells while in a blood rage created by bands you wear.

rows.name: Ephod of Authority
effects: Effective cleric level increases by 1 for the purpose of turning undead (not for rebuking or commanding).

other: turn undead, possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Lenses of Revelation
effects: Perceive a creature’s true nature for 1 round (visible only to you) as a faint colored aura: Red (evil outsider), Bone-white (undead), Green (any other).
Effects that defeat detect evil also mask the target from these lenses.

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Cord of Favor
effects: +5 competence bonus on Sense Motive checks (continuous).
3/day: Sacrifice a prepared divine spell or divine slot of 1st level or higher to use divine favor (use your caster level or the cord’s, whichever is higher).

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Badge of Glory
effects: 2/day: The next melee attack you make this turn against an evil creature deals +1 damage per two character levels.
If you have smite evil, the extra damage equals that granted by your smite evil ability (or the above value, whichever is greater).

other: ability to smite evil, possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Phylactery of Virtue
effects: +2 morale bonus on saves against energy drain, death effects, and negative energy effects (continuous).
2/day: Sacrifice a prepared divine spell or slot of 4th level or higher to use death ward (use your caster level or the phylactery’s, whichever is higher).

other: possession of a piece of the set

rows.name: Choker of Life Protection
effects: +2 dodge bonus to AC against attacks of undead while any protection charges remain.
Negate up to three negative levels per day; each prevented level expends one of three stones on the choker (stones reset at dawn). You may negate them one at a time or all at once.

rows.name: Gauntlets of Ghost Fighting
